info.title: Soccer Football Info
info.description: A football advanced API: live, odds and historical data. In CSV or JSON format

get.description: Returns with match data: id, date, status, timer, championship data, match stats and match events

200.description: Match data: id, date, status, timer, championship data, match stats and match events

X-Rate-Limit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

get.description: Returns with match data: id, date, status, timer, championship data, match stats, match events and match odds

200.description: Match data: id, date, status, timer, championship data, match stats, match events and match odds

X-Rate-Limit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

get.description: Returns with all match odds (if avaible): 1x2, over_under (goal line), asian handicap, asian corner, 1 half asian handicap, 1 half over under, 1 half asian corner and 1 half result. All odds provided from bet365 and unibet

200.description: All match odds

X-Rate-Limit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

get.description:
Returns with match data (stats and odds) every 30 seconds.
 This endpoint has data since 2020-01-01
 Live match can be view only with ULTRA plan
This call is our killer feature
The return format can be 'json' or 'csv' (use 'f' parameter). The CSV format is MS excel compatible (import with double click)

parameters.name: f
parameters.description: Format of response can be 'json' or 'csv' (default 'json')

200.description: View matches progressive (trend) data of stats and odds every 30 seconds

X-Rate-Limit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

get.description:
Returns with all matches of as specific day with: id, date, status, championship data, match stats and match events (only in JSON).
This call pagine only for today and future day, in past there is all result in one call. If you want to know how it works show FAQ on our documentation (https://info.soccerfootball.info/faq#how-paginate-work)
The return format can be 'json' or 'csv' (use 'f' parameter). The CSV format is MS excel compatible (import with double click)

parameters.name: f
parameters.description: Format of response can be 'json' or 'csv' (default 'json')

200.description: View matches in a day with a basic data

X-Rate-Limit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

get.description:
Returns with all stadiums and their data: id, name, city, country, capacity, geo coordinates and if has an image.
This is a paginate call, if you want to know how it works show FAQ on our documentation (https://info.soccerfootball.info/faq#how-paginate-work)
The return format can be 'json' or 'csv' (use 'f' parameter). The CSV format is MS excel compatible (import with double click)

parameters.name: f
parameters.description: Format of response can be 'json' or 'csv' (default 'json')

get.description:
Returns with all macthes of a specific team in a lapse of time: 'all' from 2017-01-01, '1y' last year, '6m' last 6 months.
The return format can be 'json' or 'csv' (use 'f' parameter). The CSV format is MS excel compatible (import with double click)

parameters.name: w
parameters.description: lapse of time can be all 1y 6m

parameters.name: f
parameters.description: Format of response can be 'json' or 'csv' (default 'json')

get.description:
Returns with all live matches with totalcorner schema (match/today).
Why?
Because of our customers have written software/bots and applications based on the totalcorner scheme. Changing APIs would mean rewriting everything. This way our customers can access our data, and not change their software!
 See out docs at (https://info.soccerfootball.info/v1/emulated/totalcorner/match-today) to read all differents and improvements of our version.

200.description: Returns with all live matches with totalcorner schema (match/today)

X-Rate-Limit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period

get.description:
This endpoint returns with past, present or future match with totalcorner schema..
Why?
Because of our customers have written software/bots and applications based on the totalcorner scheme. Changing APIs would mean rewriting everything. This way our customers can access our data, and not change their software!
 See out docs at (https://info.soccerfootball.info/v1/emulated/totalcorner/match-today) to read all differents and improvements of our version.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date ISO format without separator (default today)

200.description: Returns with all live matches with totalcorner schema (match/today)

X-Rate-Limit-Limit.description: The number of allowed requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Remaining.description: The number of remaining requests in the current period

X-Rate-Limit-Reset.description: The number of seconds left in the current period
